name: Dropbox
description: Driver to synchronize files with your Dropbox account. Needs to run the get_access_token.py script first in order to retrieve your OAuth access token key and secret to use with Onitu.

root.name: Root
root.description: The root of the directories under Onitu's watch

access_key.name: Dropbox Access Token Key
access_key.description: The key provided by Dropbox with the OAuth access token.

access_secret.name: Dropbox Access Token Secret
access_secret.description: The secret provided by Dropbox with the OAuth access token.

changes_timer.name: Changes timer
changes_timer.description: The frequency to check changes on the Dropbox account (in seconds).
